00009 class FloorplanIndividual(Individual):
00010     def __init__(self, random, genome_len, genome):
00011         Individual.__init__(self, random, genome_len, genome)
00012 
00013         self.rank = 10
00014         self.crowded_distance = 0
00015         self.decoded_plan = None
00016         self.numRoom = None
00017         self.roomarea = None
00018         self.roomlist = None
00019         self.roomDesc = None
00020         self.roomSizes = None

00022     def __cmp__(self, other):
00023         return cmp(self.rank, other.rank)

00027 class Floorplanner(app.Application):
00028     def __init__(self, params, random):
00029         app.Application.__init__(self, params, random)

00031 #-------------------------------------------#
00032     def createPop(self, popsize):        
00033         
00034         import createInd
00035         pop = []
00036 
00037         # template individual
00038         tree_genome = self.params['template']
00039         new_ind = Individual(self.random, None, genome=tree_genome)
00040         self.decodePlan(new_ind)
00041         new_ind.rank = 1
00042         new_ind.crowded_distance = 100
00043         pop.append(new_ind)
00044 
00045         for i in xrange(popsize-1):
00046             tree_genome = createInd.createIndividual(self.params['maxDepth'], self.params['maxRoom'], self.params['minRoom'])
00047             new_ind = FloorplanIndividual(self.random, None, genome=tree_genome)
00048             self.decodePlan(new_ind)
00049             pop.append(new_ind)
00050         
00051         return pop
00052     
00053 #-------------------------------------------#
00054     def decodePlan(self, ind):
00055         room_list = parseTree.parseTree(ind, self.params['plotSizeX'],self.params['plotSizeY'])
00056         plan = decodePlan.decodePlan(room_list)
00057 
00058         ind.decoded_plan = plan
00059         ind.numRoom = plan[0]
00060         ind.roomarea = plan[1]
00061         ind.roomlist = plan[2]
00062         ind.roomDesc = plan[3]
00063         ind.roomSizes = plan[4]
00064 
00065 #-------------------------------------------#
00066     def roomDims(self, desc, size):
00067 
00068         dim = []
00069         for rooms in xrange(len(desc)):
00070             if desc[rooms] != 'S':
00071                 length = size[rooms][2] - size[rooms][0]
00072                 breadth = size[rooms][3] - size[rooms][1]
00073                 dim.append(desc[rooms])
00074                 dim.append(length)
00075                 dim.append(breadth)
00076 
00077         return dim
00078 
00079         
00080 #-------------------------------------------#
00081     def fitness(self, ind, user_feedback):
00082         '''
00083         Compute fitness.
00084         '''
00085         self.decodePlan(ind)
00086 
00087         best = user_feedback[0]
00088 
00089         roomNum = ind.numRoom
00090         totArea = ind.roomarea
00091         SharedWalls = ind.roomlist
00092         roomNumBest = best.numRoom
00093         totAreaBest = best.roomarea
00094         SharedBest = best.roomlist
00095 
00096         fit = []
00097         Dimensions = self.roomDims(ind.roomDesc, ind.roomSizes)
00098 
00099         # 1.Number of rooms
00100         if roomNum == 0 or roomNum == 1 or roomNum > 8:
00101             fit.append(max(roomNumBest-2,8-roomNumBest)+1)
00102         else:
00103             fit.append(abs(roomNum - roomNumBest))
00104 
00105         # 2.Adjacency
00106         penalty = 0
00107         for rels in xrange(len(SharedWalls)):
00108             penalty = penalty + (SharedWalls[rels] - SharedBest[rels])**2
00109         fit.append(penalty)
00110 
00111         #---------------------------------------------
00112         # small helper func
00113         def room_append(dim, room_dim, descriptor):
00114             k = dim.index(descriptor)
00115             room_dim.extend([dim[k+1],dim[k+2]])
00116         #---------------------------------------------
00117         # small helper func 2
00118         def compute_penalty(room1, room2, dim1, dim2):
00119             penalty = 0.
00120             if room1 < room2:
00121                 if room1 < dim1:
00122                     penalty = dim1 - room1
00123             else:
00124                 if room2 < dim1:
00125                     penalty = dim1 - room2
00126 
00127             penalty1 = penalty/dim1
00128 
00129             penalty = 0.0
00130             if room1*room2 < dim2:
00131                 penalty = dim2 - room1*room2
00132 
00133             penalty2 = penalty/dim2
00134 
00135             return penalty1, penalty2
00136         #---------------------------------------------
00137 
00138         # 3.NeufertGuide Rules
00139         if roomNum == 0 or roomNum == 1:
00140             fit.append(1.0)
00141             fit.append(1.0)
00142         else:
00143             penalty = 0.0
00144             penaltyOne = 0.0
00145             penaltyTwo = 0.0
00146             roomDim = []
00147 
00148             if roomNum == 2:
00149                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'LBK')
00150 
00151                 # Minimum dimension of LBK should be 20'10" and minimum area should be 300 sq.ft.
00152                 penaltyOne, penaltyTwo = compute_penalty(roomDim[0], roomDim[1], 104.2, 7500.0)
00153 
00154                 fit.append(penaltyOne/104.2)
00155                 fit.append(penaltyTwo/7500.0)
00156 
00157             elif roomNum == 3:
00158                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'LKT')
00159                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'BED')
00160 
00161                 # Minimum dimension of LKT should be 19'10" and minimum area should be 270 sq.ft.
00162                 penaltyOne, penaltyTwo = compute_penalty(roomDim[0], roomDim[1], 99.2, 6750.0)
00163 
00164                 # Minimum dimension of BED should be 9'4" and minimum area should be 120 sq.ft.
00165                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[2], roomDim[3], 46.7, 3000.0)
00166                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00167                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00168 
00169                 fit.append(penaltyOne/2.0)
00170                 fit.append(penaltyTwo/2.0)
00171 
00172             elif roomNum == 4:
00173                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'LKT')
00174                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'MBR')
00175                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'BED')
00176 
00177                 # Minimum dimension of LKT should be 19'10" and minimum area should be 270 sq.ft.
00178                 penaltyOne, penaltyTwo = compute_penalty(roomDim[0], roomDim[1], 99.2, 6750.0)
00179 
00180                 # Minimum dimension of MBR should be 9'4" and minimum area should be 120 sq.ft.
00181                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[2], roomDim[3], 46.7, 3000.0)
00182                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00183                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00184                 
00185                 # Minimum dimension of BED should be 8' and minimum area should be 80 sq.ft
00186                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[4], roomDim[5], 40.0, 2000.0)
00187                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00188                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00189 
00190                 fit.append(penaltyOne/3.0)
00191                 fit.append(penaltyTwo/3.0)
00192 
00193             elif roomNum == 5:
00194                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'LIV')
00195                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'MBR')
00196                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'BED')
00197                     
00198                 # Minimum dimension of LIV should be 11'6" and minimum area should be 160 sq.ft.
00199                 penaltyOne, penaltyTwo = compute_penalty(roomDim[0], roomDim[1], 57.5, 4000.0)
00200 
00201                 # Minimum dimension of MBR should be 9'4" and minimum area should be 120 sq.ft.
00202                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[2], roomDim[3], 46.7, 3000.0)
00203                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00204                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00205 
00206                 # Minimum dimension of BED should be 8' and minimum area should be 80 sq.ft
00207                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[4], roomDim[5], 40.0, 2000.0)
00208                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00209                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00210 
00211                 fit.append(penaltyOne/3.0)
00212                 fit.append(penaltyTwo/3.0)
00213                 
00214             elif roomNum == 6:
00215                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'LIV')
00216                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'MBR')
00217                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'DIN')
00218                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'BED')
00219                     
00220                 # Minimum dimension of LIV should be 11'6" and minimum area should be 160 sq.ft.
00221                 penaltyOne, penaltyTwo = compute_penalty(roomDim[0], roomDim[1], 57.5, 4000.0)
00222 
00223                 # Minimum dimension of MBR should be 9'4" and minimum area should be 120 sq.ft.
00224                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[2], roomDim[3], 46.7, 3000.0)
00225                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00226                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00227 
00228                 # Minimum dimension of DIN should be 8'4" and minimum area should be 100 sq.ft.
00229                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[4], roomDim[5], 41.7, 2500.0)
00230                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00231                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00232 
00233                 # Minimum dimension of BED should be 8' and minimum area should be 80 sq.ft
00234                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[6], roomDim[7], 40.0, 2000.0)
00235                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00236                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00237                 
00238                 fit.append(penaltyOne/4.0)
00239                 fit.append(penaltyTwo/4.0)
00240 
00241             else:
00242                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'LIV')
00243                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'MBR')
00244                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'DIN')
00245                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'BED')
00246                 room_append(Dimensions, roomDim, 'GBR')
00247                 
00248                 # Minimum dimension of LIV should be 11'6" and minimum area should be 170 sq.ft.
00249                 penaltyOne, penaltyTwo = compute_penalty(roomDim[0], roomDim[1], 57.5, 4250.0)
00250 
00251                 # Minimum dimension of MBR should be 9'4" and minimum area should be 120 sq.ft.
00252                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[2], roomDim[3], 46.7, 3000.0)
00253                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00254                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00255 
00256                 # Minimum dimension of DIN should be 8'4" and minimum area should be 110 sq.ft.
00257                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[4], roomDim[5], 41.7, 2750.0)
00258                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00259                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00260 
00261                 # Minimum dimension of BED should be 8' and minimum area should be 80 sq.ft
00262                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[6], roomDim[7], 40.0, 2000.0)
00263                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00264                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00265             
00266                 # Minimum dimension of GBR should be 8' and minimum area should be 80 sq.ft
00267                 pen1_temp, pen2_temp = compute_penalty(roomDim[8], roomDim[9], 40.0, 2000.0)
00268                 penaltyOne += pen1_temp
00269                 penaltyTwo += pen2_temp
00270 
00271                 fit.append(penaltyOne/5.0)
00272                 fit.append(penaltyTwo/5.0)
00273         
00274         # 4.Total Built Area
00275         if roomNum == 0 or roomNum == 1:
00276             fit.append(1.0)
00277         else:
00278             penalty = 0.0
00279             if sum(totArea) < sum(totAreaBest):
00280                 penalty = (sum(totAreaBest) - sum(totArea))/sum(totAreaBest)
00281 
00282             fit.append(penalty)
00283             
00284         ind.fitness = fit
00285 #ind.fitness = sum(fit)

00288 #-------------------------------------------#
00289     def draw(self, parentPanel, subset):
00290         '''
00291         Return a list of panels to be displayed to the user for evaluation.
00292         Use the arg parentPanel as the parent for each of the panels created.
00293         '''
00294         panels = []
00295         for i in xrange(len(subset)):
00296             panels.append(blockmaker.BlockMaker(parentPanel,dimensions=subset[i].roomSizes,description=subset[i].roomDesc))
00297         return panels

00301     def paramSpace(self, pop, user_selected):
00302         best = user_selected[0]
00303         objmax = [max(best.numRoom-2,8-best.numRoom)+1,5,1.0,1.0,1.0]
00304         objmin = [0,0,0.0,0.0,0.0]
00305         return objmax, objmin
